## Protocol.Runtime.EvaluateRequest.throwOnSideEffect property

Whether to throw an exception if side effect cannot be ruled out during evaluation. This implies `disableBreaks` below.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
throwOnSideEffect?: boolean;
```
